item.description:
Dear Members,

How are you doing?

Last month we had a wonderful discussion staring from Dr. Len’s story to everyone's story. Thanks to Bill, Peter, Harry, Deb, Karen, Shang-Sheng and Selina. Thanks for sharing your experience and input and let us learn a lot from each other.

If you would like to meet more friends with the same interest about seeking a spiritual life, please come and share your thoughts and experiences about how to practice spirituality in daily life.

Enjoy the day and let’s create positive energy to the whole world.
item.name: Westborough Spirituality February Meetup
